oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Camel Rock & Roll Dance Party - 1956-06-30 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: CBS Rock 'N' Roll Dance Party program sponsored by Camel cigarettes, 1956-06-30 part 2. Hosted by Alan Freed with announcer Bern Bennett, starring Count Basie and his Orchestra with vocalist Joe Williams, and featuring LaVern Baker, and the Cadillacs. Produced and directed by Lou Melamed.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Joe Williams; Count Basie Orchestra; LaVern Baker; Cadillacs
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Alan Freed introduces Joe Williams -- No Moon At All (Joe Williams, Count Basie Orchestra) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Alan Freed introduces LaVern Baker -- Fee Fee Fi Fo Fum (LaVern Baker) -- Alan Freed introduces the Cadillacs -- Woe Is Me (Cadillacs) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Alan Freed introduces Count Basie and his Orchestra -- Jumpin' At The Woodside (Count Basie Orchestra) -- Closing statement (Alan Freed) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Bern Bennett) -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company; Camel rock 'n roll dance party (Radio program); Freed, Alan; Bennett, Bern, 1921-2014; Basie, Count, 1904-1984; Count Basie Orchestra; Williams, Joe, 1918-1999; Baker, LaVern; Cadillacs (Musical group); Foster, Frank, 1928-2011; Melamed, Louis
